document.full_text: a top u.s. general expressed concern to congress on tuesday about the expanding reach of the pakistan-based lashkar-e-taiba militant group, warning it was no longer solely focused on india or even south asia.
document.title: pakistan-based militant group expanding: u.s. general
lines_and_colors: a top u.s. general expressed concern to congress on tuesday about the expanding reach of the pakistan-based lashkar-e-taiba militant group, warning it was no longer solely focused on india or even south asia.
